spec: upgrade all dependencies so that kotlin 2.1.0 can be used
commitMessage:
Upgrade to Kotlin 2.1.0 and update dependencies

- Updated Kotlin version from 1.9.22 to 2.1.0
- Updated Quarkus version to 3.6.4 for compatibility
- Updated Kotest to 5.9.1
- Updated Mockito to 5.2.0
- Updated other dependencies to latest compatible versions
- Removed resolution strategy that was forcing older Kotlin versions
